item.description:
Hey Gamers! I am working on our Next Community Games Day, and should have a date in the next week or so.

I am also working on securing a monthly gaming area for us.

I wanted to invite the group to come join us for some outside Geocaching fun.

Learn what its all about and do some different types of caches.

For those of you who dont know, Geocaching is treasure hunting with handheld GPS units.

Please bring small trade items ( inexpensive trinkets ) to trade into the caches if you like.

If you have any questions please e-mail me.

There is parking on site. Please dress for walking in the woods. We will be walking quite a bit so where comfortable walking shoes.

Also if any gamers do attend I would like to meet after the event to see if we can work out some details for Gaming events.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Geocache: I know its not gaming but its fun!
